name: Circle of Kerzoven
storyline: In a profoundly simulated world, every action has a reaction. Take care of your villagers, resources, production lines and the interaction with the complex environment. How much will you intervene in the course of nature? You decide.
summary: Circle of Kerzoven is a city-building strategy game paired with an immersive simulation experience. Every animal and every plant tries to survive while you lead your entrusted creatures to a bright future. Expand to different regions or trade with local factions to gain needed resources.
